name: Gravity is the Enemy
description:
Gravity is the Enemy:

This is a small collections of microgames inspired by the WarioWare franchise made in 24 hours because of a challenge raised by my friend BLANKdev.

The game features five different levels that will be randomly picked for 10 stages of 3 levels each with increasing difficulty. You will play every level more than once, but they are going to be more difficult as you progress through the game.

You have 4 HP, or chances to mess up a level. If you beat the 10 stages you win, if you fail any 4 levels you lose.

The coding, the art and the music were all made in 18 of the 24 hours, then I was to tired to carry on lol.

Soundtrack:

You can find both the regular and reversed soundtrack either on YouTube or SoundCloud:
- Gravity is the Enemy (8 bit): YT, SC
- Gravity is the Enemy (8 bit, reversed): YT, SC

Controls:

The controls are microgame dependent. and you can see them at all time in the top right corner. Control schemes can either be:
- W/D Keys or Arrow Keys
- Spacebar
- All letter keys (A-Z)
